author: stoddard
msg: Bail out gracefully if any part od cache load fails. Still need to handle bailing
out of serving out of the cache fails.

author: stoddard
msg: Change the return type on read_headers, write_headers, read_body and write_body.
Sanitize some of the return codes.

author: gregames
msg: ap_rgetline: fix folding and partial line handling on ebcdic boxes.  The
normal case worked OK, but due to the recursion and multiple exit points,
input bytes could go thru charset translation multiple times or not at all.

author: stoddard
msg: Do a better job of cleaning up (plug memory leaks) and handling aborted
cache updates. We really need a better way to allocate cache_objects.
Making WAY too many malloc/calloc calls...
